job description:
• *Applications Scientist, Home Care**
Lubrizol Advanced Materials is an essential ingredient in improving lives. Our innovative products enhance the shampoos, lotions and soaps you use; the medicine you take; the sports apparel and shoes you wear; the detergents that keep your whites whiter and your colors from fading; the medical devices that speed your recovery and enhance your comfort; the specialty coatings that make your wood furniture, floors and cabinets more durable, more beautiful and more sustainable; and the plumbing systems in your home that will never corrode, pit or scale. With such a diverse portfolio, Lubrizol Advanced Materials offers unparalleled career growth opportunities for top-talent. To learn more about each of our core businesses, click on the following links: Engineered Polymers at https://www.lubrizol.com/Engineered-Polymers/ , Personal Care at https://www.lubrizol.com/Personal-Care , Home Care at https://www.lubrizol.com/Home-Care , Lubrizol LifeSciences at https://www.lubrizol.com/Life-Sciences , Performance Coatings at https://www.lubrizol.com/Coatings , and Lubrizol CPVC Piping Systems at https://www.lubrizol.com/CPVC/ .
  • *LUBRIZOL HOME CARE**
  • *Adding value through improved functionality and enhanced performance to economical, efficient cleaning applications.**
Lubrizol Advanced Materials is hiring an Applications Scientist to support our Home Care Applications team. Learn more about our Home Care Division at https://www.lubrizol.com/Home-Care
  • *What you will do:**
+ Support product application developments for Home Care Applications in coordination with the Global Application Manager.

+ Perform laboratory experiments, design formulations and conduct performance evaluations of Home Care products.

+ Provide technical support to key customers by demonstrating product benefits through testing data.

+ Work closely with the account managers as a technical liaison to help commercialize customer projects.

+ Develop unique formulated solutions and property relationships by using industry standards or develop unique test methods to demonstrate Lubrizol product superiority.

+ Complete projects and assignments in a timely manner and summarize results.

+ Produce accurate and reproducible tests and data.

+ Organize laboratory work to meet multiple assignment objectives.

+ Maintain clear records of experiments, results and conclusions. Keep up to date laboratory notebook.

+ Troubleshoot and solve problems independently.

+ Ensure compliance with safety procedures and good housekeeping practices.

+ Actively participate in department safety programs.
  • *What you need:**
+ Minimum of B.S. Degree in Chemistry, Chemical Engineering or similar.

+ Ability to work independently and in support of the Sr Scientists and/or Application Manager.

+ Understanding of formulations, applications, handling of chemicals and safe work practices.

+ Some industrial experience in Home Care ingredients and formulations, as well as performance testing desired.

+ Ability to plan and organize multiple assignments with minimal supervision.

+ Good chemical and math abilities in recipe calculations.

+ Ability to maintain an accurate legal record of experimental results, provide written summaries and offer initial interpretation of results.

+ Self-motivated with ability to identify and obtain necessary materials to maintain laboratory and support ongoing projects.

+ Good organizational, interpersonal, written, verbal and computer skills.
  • *CONSIDERED A PLUS:**
+ Technical experience in Home Care Products formulation and testing

+ Knowledge of the polymers and additives used in above-mentioned market formulations.

With multiple facilities in and around Cleveland, Ohio at http://www.thisiscleveland.com/ , Lubrizol is located in one of the largest economic regions in the United States. Buzzing with business, culture, knowledge and entertainment, Northeast Ohio at http://www.globalcleveland.org/ is a vibrant place for people of all ages and walks of life to live, learn, work and play. From making your heart race at Cedar Point, to attending a professional sporting event or biking or hiking through over the 100,000 acres of state parks, to catching a Broadway show at Playhouse Square - the second largest performing arts center in the country, you can make it happen right here in Cleveland, Ohio .
